content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. As a landlord, I am always looking for the best possible deal to maximize my gains. Can you please offer me a rental price for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 800 Euro per month. Is that okay with you?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal, Max. While I appreciate your offer, I believe there is room for negotiation. Can we discuss the possibility of increasing the rental price to 900 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your point of view, but I can't go higher than 800 Euro per month. Can we agree on 800 Euro per month?

Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Max. While I would prefer a higher rental price, I can agree to your proposal of 800 Euro per month. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and I look forward to your tenancy. If you have any other questions, please feel free to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
